channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Sofa dumped on Gables Close, 25th August
item.description:
A sofa has been dumped on the street in Gables Close and needs to be removed. Has already been reported through other channels but both has been done

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gables Close, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped setee, paving slabs and crockery, 25th August
item.description:
Something new appears each weekend. Someone is having a clear out - believed squatters- from the arch that runs parallel to Abbey Street. Door photographed here. Newly dumped settee cushions, crockery, paving slabs put by the brewery bins. Attracting rats.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 67-68, Enid Street, Bermondsey, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sharp branches at torso and face level, 25th August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rochester Avenue, Widmore, London

item.title: Large bush at upper body level covering half the pavement, 25th August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rochester Avenue, Widmore, London

item.title: More bed frames and mattresses added here, 25th August
item.description:
Dumped mattresses and bed frames at the entrance of Cherbury close. Do something about this Peabody/council. We pay service charges and council tax and we deserve proper service around the area.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Summerton Way, London
Report on FixMyStreet
